title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 17 June 2009 - XWiki
content:
cristinas - (17/06/2009 00:00): anyway .. if this will be changed using services .. ity isn't important what api i use for now ..  
cristinas - (17/06/2009 00:01): i will choose the api from openoffice   
vmassol joined #xwiki at 00:07  
cristinas left at 00:07 ("Leaving")  
sdumitriu - (17/06/2009 00:07): cristinas: florinciu: I think it's more important to have it working sooner in a pretty clean way that to search for the perfect way in a long time  
florinciu - (17/06/2009 00:08): +1  
vmassol left at 00:09 (Client Quit)  
cristinaS joined #xwiki at 00:09  
sdumitriu - (17/06/2009 00:13): cristinas: I think it's more important to have it working sooner in a pretty clean way that to search for the perfect way in a long time  
cristinaS - (17/06/2009 00:15): yes , you are right

arunreddy - (17/06/2009 08:33): marta\_ : Hi  
arunreddy - (17/06/2009 08:33): Good morning.  
lucaa1 left at 08:33 ("Leaving.")  
arunreddy - (17/06/2009 08:35): I want to creaet .vm file and would like to use it. Am i supposed to register it any where. Or mere creating one inside XE/webapps/xwiki/templates and using it will do.  
marta\_ - (17/06/2009 08:36): 'morning arunreddy  
marta\_ - (17/06/2009 08:36): you just need to put it in templates  
arunreddy - (17/06/2009 08:38): marta\_: i have created one but still am unable to use it.It doesnt work .  
arunreddy - (17/06/2009 08:39): created one file called wikiImporter.vm  
arunreddy - (17/06/2009 08:39): some normal text content in it.  
marta\_ - (17/06/2009 08:39): how are you tryinng to use it?  
arunreddy - (17/06/2009 08:39): #template('wikiImporter.vm')  
arunreddy - (17/06/2009 08:39): inside the velocity scripting tags.   
arunreddy - (17/06/2009 08:40): Am able to access the existing vm's  
kaaloo joined #xwiki at 08:40  
arunreddy - (17/06/2009 08:41): {{velocity}}{{html}}#template('wikiImporter.vm'){{/html}}{{/velocity}} to be perfect.  
marta\_ - (17/06/2009 08:51): i can't reproduce this, it works for me on several wiki versions...  
arunreddy - (17/06/2009 08:54): ok.Thanks.   
arunreddy - (17/06/2009 08:55): Should we add the vm file before building the XE ? Or even the all ready running XE will aslo do.?  
arunreddy - (17/06/2009 08:55): s/aslo/also :)  
vmassol joined #xwiki at 08:56  
marta\_ - (17/06/2009 08:56): it shouldn't matter when you addit  
arunreddy - (17/06/2009 08:57): Ok  
lucaa joined #xwiki at 08:59  
arkub joined #xwiki at 08:59  
vmassol left at 09:02 ()  
trifon joined #xwiki at 09:07  
arunreddy - (17/06/2009 09:08): marta\_: I would like to access a file locally (XML file) and pass it to a component.   
arunreddy - (17/06/2009 09:08): as InputStream.  
arunreddy - (17/06/2009 09:09): I tried to work in the lines of importInline.vm but the vm itself is having some trouble i mine. Any other way.?
